subject: Magic bonus on your first deposit!
body:
Looking for a new exciting gambling venue






Looking for a new exciting gambling venue?

If your game is blackjack or roulette, Magic Jackpot's 
live dealers will really give you a feel of the real thing. 
If slots is your favorite game - you can play and win the 
highest prise ever at the new €5 000 000 Video 
Slot Millionaire's Lane. 
To start, Magic Jackpots Offers you a magic bonus on your first deposit!
Make a deposit on Magic Jackpot and your Account will immediately 
be credited with a 100% bonus: 

Deposit 20 Euro Play with 40 Euro 
Deposit 250 Euro Play with 500 Euro 

Live support will answer any question you may have
24/7, and winners enjoy fast and easy payments.
